text: Vitor Airport is an airport serving the Vitor District in the Arequipa Region of Peru. The joint military/public airport is just west of the agricultural town of La Joya. The airport also has the name Mayor FAP Guillermo Protset del Castillo Airport, and an additional ICAO code of SPVT. The Arequipa VOR-DME (Ident: EQU) is located east-northeast of the airport. The Sihuas VOR (Ident: UAS) is located to the west-northwest. There is rising terrain northwest through northeast of the airport. ==See also== * * *Transport in Peru *List of airports in Peru ==References== ==External links== *OpenStreetMap - Vitor *OurAirports - Vitor Airport * * Category:Airports in Peru Category:Buildings and structures in Arequipa Region
title: Mayor FAP Guillermo Protset del Castillo Airport
